short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instant lyrics on YouTube, Spotify and other sites in a flexible panel. 40+ sources ensure that lyrics are always found

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Formerly "YouTube Lyrics by Rob W".

What does this extension do?
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯ 
Displays lyrics in a flexible panel at YouTube and many other music sites. Human-readable lyrics are immediately shown, together with a link to the source and an option to look up the lyrics from a different source.
The panel can be toggled at any time (for supported sites) via the extension button.

The extension is highly customizable and recognizes 50+ sources, defaulting to:
- Lyrics.wikia.com
- Lyrics.com
- MetroLyrics.com
- AZLyrics.com
- Bing to search in 50+ other sources.

The full list of sources, detailed guide and interactive demo are available at: https://robwu.nl/lyricshere/

By default, lyrics are only shown on YouTube.
many other music sites are also supported, but only after enabling them at the options page. The full list is at https://robwu.nl/lyricshere/#config-sites


__________________________________
Change log
3.14.1 - Add extra search engines (Startpage, Ixquick, Qwant), improved options page, added new source, add menu item to hide in-page button.
3.14.2 - Improve support for YouTube and Deezer's new designs, updated sources, ensure that all requests are anonymous (no cookies).

The full history of changes is available at:
https://robwu.nl/lyricshere/CHANGELOG
